org.relationlearn.filters

Interface TextFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonWordsFilter, PunctuationCounterFilter, WordOcurrenceFilter, WordRatioFilter, WordSearchFilter

    public interface TextFilter
    The TextFilter interface represents an object capable of obtaining a certain information from a pair of text Strings and map them to a given Attribute to be used when creating Instance objects.
    See Also:
    Attribute, Instance, FilterGroup

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double filter(String r, String h)
      Filters the corresponding pair of String values and returns its value in the weka internal floating-point format.
      Attribute getMappedAttribute()
      Returns the Attribute that this filter provides a value for.

    • Method Detail

      • getMappedAttribute

        Attribute getMappedAttribute()
        Returns the Attribute that this filter provides a value for.
        Returns:
        the Attribute this filter gives a value to

      • filter

        double filter(String r,
            String h)
        Filters the corresponding pair of String values and returns its value in the weka internal floating-point format.

        The method return type is able to support all types of Attribute that exist, with a single method for all possible TextFilter implementations.

        Parameters:
        r - Response text in the argumentation
        h - Hypothesis text in the argumentation
        Returns:
        the value of this filter Attribute in weka internal floating-point format
        See Also:
        Instance.setValue(Attribute,double)
